website_summaries.verdict: If what hikers need in a sandal is high amounts of comfort, then they will not be let down by the remarkably stylish Yucatan from Ecco Sport. They will also be delighted to know that this superbly lightweight yet durable hiking gear has tons of arch support—a quality many people so raved about in their reviews. All that said, the footgear misses the mark in a few areas, the most saddening of which would have to be its non-adjustable front strap. Overall, in spite of its shortcomings, the Ecco Yucatan sandal still packs robust enough features to help users perform well on the trail. Those who are a little bit on the scrawny side around the forefoot, however, might want to give this one a pass.
pros: Droves of users were greatly astonished by the extreme level of comfort of the Ecco Yucatan
Some of them attributed this entrancing quality to the hiker’s unbelievably soft footbed
Numerous reviewers couldn’t help but praise this hiking footwear for its outstanding durability
A number of them said that their gear didn’t sustain wear and tear for several years
Dozens of buyers loved the overall aesthetics of their Ecco Yucatan sandals
Its lightness was applauded by many owners
It made its wearers pull off quick maneuvers and stay agile for the rest of their hike
This hiking sandal from Ecco received colorful remarks from a considerable number of consumers for having fantastic arch support
According to professional footwear bloggers, the Ecco Sport Yucatan sandal runs true to size
A good percentage of customers were smitten by the versatility of this strappy sandal
They said it is as effective on earthy trails as it is on urban surfaces, such as those found in grocery stores and airports
Gear experts were super impressed with the hiker’s outsole
They were able to remain surefooted with enough grip on various kinds of surfaces
Some of those who bought this hiking footgear felt like they purchased something a bit expensive but worth every penny
A tiny fraction of the reviewing populace applauded its stabilizing prowess
These individuals felt quite confident walking over the rockier parts of the trail because of this
One shoe critic was astounded by the gear’s confines
She said that in them, wearers suffering from plantar fasciitis would feel right at home
cons: Several testers, one of whom is an expert reviewer, thought that the Yucatan’s front strap being non-adjustable was a real downer
Less than a handful of verified purchasers were quite critical of the sandal’s sweat-inducing footbed
Its lack of a wide width option was an utter disappointment for a few disgruntled owners
They had to make do of its restrictive enclosure
According to some users, the sandal began to stink pretty early on
Most of them blamed it on the lining that wouldn’t give up the smell of sweat even after washing the footwear extensively
A very small percentage of consumers found the latest refresh of this hiking shoe somewhat underwhelming
They noticed that its build quality is no longer as excellent as the previous editions’
This hiking product from Ecco irked a couple of buyers for requiring too much time to dry

customer_reviews.title: Ecco is quality
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with these sandals. I have very narrow and slim feet that need support and I can walk for miles in these. I wear mine for many summer seasons. I only had to buy a new pair because one of our dogs chewed mine.
customer_reviews.author: Ely

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous sandals , good price. Ordered 5.5 but I wear a 5 , on the sandal its has 38 on sole which is a 5 , fitted perfect . Lovely colour .
customer_reviews.author: von1

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous walking sandals. Unfortunately had to return as 5.5 was too big. And I couldn’t get a size 5.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Keena

customer_reviews.title: Great 'off-roaders'
customer_reviews.text: Ideal holiday walking sandal. Very comfortable and saved money by buying on line x
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.  Mmmm

customer_reviews.title: Ecco Women’s Off Road Athletic sandals.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and fit. Good service by vendor. A very good product which I have purchased before - in Norway 4 years ago and the old ones are still in good order.
customer_reviews.author: Gill J

customer_reviews.title: My third pair !
customer_reviews.text: I have three pairs now of theses angles, this pair to keep in case they stop producing it. I find them very comfortable , I need arch support sndthey suit me fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jean bean

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with these sandals. Great quality, style and comfort. Fast delivery too.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Dora

customer_reviews.title: I will be buying these again.
customer_reviews.text: My feet need special foot ware and these fit the bill very comfortable all in all a great purchase.i
customer_reviews.author: patricia young

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the most comfortable walking sandals that I have ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rockingham

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, you can adjust straps for foot width and also at ankle. comfortable foot bed with good thick sole for walks
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and do not slip
customer_reviews.text: I climbed Mont Blanc without wearing these sand-les in at all. They were so comfortable, did not slip, and caused no soreness .
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Digby

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable for sight seeing holidays / never have to break in these sandals
customer_reviews.author: Nana kay

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, good support
customer_reviews.text: Lovely sandals. Comfortable, good support. Second pair. Will last for years. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: "Madge"

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fabulously comfortable with good support and good soles for walking.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Jones

customer_reviews.title: Lovely sandals
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product Very comfortable and lovely colour
customer_reviews.author: marley

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and really comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great to wear! Look great and so comfy. The adjustable straps make them fit your feet perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Feefs

product_meta.title: ECCO Women's Offroad Open Toe Sandals
product_meta.description: Versatile design features make this sturdy nubuck upper sandal great for outdoor wear. Lightweight with a specially designed tread pattern provides optimum comfort. Feet stay fresh with the stretch-fit material lining. Sole has been created to ensure increased support and wear ability. Superior grip and traction on outdoor terrain.
feature_bullets: Sporty sandal featuring omni-directional rubber outsole and dual hook-and-loop closures
Lightweight moulded EVA footbed with microfibre cover for supreme cuchioning and superior stability
A direct-injected PU midsole foam provides long-lasting cushioning and everyday walking comfort
Multiple adjustment points, and neoprene lining for a premium fit
